string-array.name: ThemeChangelog
string-array.item: v3.1 - Thu, 14-12-2017\n- Added back support for 8.0.\n

v3.0 - Wed, 13-12-2017
- Added support for 8.1.
- Merged upstream template changes.
- Themed navbar ripple colors.
- Themed physical keyboard shortcuts BG.
- Themed qs expand/collapse icons.
- Themed Lockscreen shortcuts circle BG.
- Themed notification app icon/name color.
- Added Shutdown animation and fonts (Requires ROM with SubstratumService).
- Added Dashboard.
- Fully themed Launcher3.
- Fully themed MusicFX.
- Center/left clock options.
- Themed notification volume panel icon.

v2.1 - Wed, 29-11-2017
- Added Carbon black BG.
- Added Kiwi Accent.
- Themed Splitscreen Navbar icon.
- Themed Substratum App.
- Themed Ripple colors to Accent.

v2.0.1 - Mon, 20-11-2017
- Fixed navbar theming.
- Update copyrights.

v2.0 - Sun, 19-11-2017
- Merged upstream substratum template.
- Oreo support.
- Redesigned Settings dashboard icons.
- Cleanedup unneeded resources.
- Redone Backgrounds and Added more accents.
- Volte icon.
- New Brightness slider icon.
- Themed Navbar icons.
- Themed Powermenu.
- Themed Volume panel.
- Fixed Dialer notification.
